kpicollection.kpi: Average response time to customer inquiries
kpicollection.explanation: Measures the average response time to customer inquiries.
kpicollection.formula: Total Time to Respond to Inquiries / Total Number of Inquiries

kpicollection.explanation: Measures customer satisfaction with support interactions.
kpicollection.formula: Average Rating of Customer Satisfaction with Support Interactions

kpicollection.explanation: Measures the total number of customer complaints resolved.
kpicollection.formula: Total Number of Customer Complaints Resolved

kpicollection.explanation: Measures the percentage of customers retained over a specific period.
kpicollection.formula: ((Number of Customers at End of Period - New Customers Acquired) / Number of Customers at Start of Period) * 100

kpicollection.explanation: Measures the productivity of the customer support team.
kpicollection.formula: Total Number of Support Cases Resolved / Total Team Hours

kpicollection.kpi: Rate of repeat customer support inquiries
kpicollection.explanation: Measures the rate of repeat inquiries from customers.
kpicollection.formula: (Number of Repeat Inquiries / Total Number of Inquiries) * 100

kpicollection.kpi: Quality of support provided (e.g., resolution accuracy)
kpicollection.explanation: Measures the accuracy of resolutions provided by support.
kpicollection.formula: (Number of Accurate Resolutions / Total Number of Resolutions) * 100

kpicollection.explanation: Measures customer feedback on support services.
kpicollection.formula: Average Rating of Customer Feedback on Support Services

kpicollection.explanation: Measures the availability of parts when needed.
kpicollection.formula: (Number of Parts Available / Total Number of Parts Requested) * 100

kpicollection.explanation: Measures the average time taken to fulfill parts orders.
kpicollection.formula: Total Time to Fulfill Parts Orders / Total Number of Parts Orders

kpicollection.kpi: Percentage of orders for wrong parts
kpicollection.explanation: Measures the percentage of orders that contain incorrect parts.
kpicollection.formula: (Number of Wrong Parts Orders / Total Number of Parts Orders) * 100

kpicollection.explanation: Measures how often the inventory of parts is turned over.
kpicollection.formula: Cost of Goods Sold for Parts / Average Parts Inventory

kpicollection.explanation: Measures the number of warranty claims related to parts.
kpicollection.formula: (Number of Warranty Claims for Parts / Total Number of Parts Sold) * 100

kpicollection.explanation: Measures the proportion of parts that are obsolete.
kpicollection.formula: (Number of Obsolete Parts / Total Number of Parts in Inventory) * 100

kpicollection.explanation: Measures the percentage of parts that are returned.
kpicollection.formula: (Number of Returned Parts / Total Number of Parts Sold) * 100

kpicollection.explanation: Measures customer satisfaction with the availability of parts.
kpicollection.formula: Average Rating of Customer Satisfaction with Parts Availability

kpicollection.explanation: Measures the utilization rate of service center capacity.
kpicollection.formula: (Current Service Center Utilization / Total Available Capacity) * 100

kpicollection.explanation: Measures the average wait time for customers at service centers.
kpicollection.formula: Total Wait Time for Service Requests / Total Number of Service Requests

kpicollection.explanation: Measures the average time taken to complete repairs at service centers.
kpicollection.formula: Total Time for Repairs / Total Number of Repairs

kpicollection.explanation: Measures the percentage of repairs fixed on the first attempt.
kpicollection.formula: (Number of Issues Resolved on First Attempt / Total Number of Issues) * 100

kpicollection.kpi: Customer satisfaction with service center experience
kpicollection.explanation: Measures customer satisfaction with their experience at service centers.
kpicollection.formula: Average Rating of Customer Satisfaction with Service Center Experience

kpicollection.explanation: Measures the average cost per repair at service centers.
kpicollection.formula: Total Repair Costs / Total Number of Repairs

kpicollection.explanation: Measures the productivity of staff at service centers.
kpicollection.formula: Total Number of Repairs Completed / Total Staff Hours

kpicollection.explanation: Measures the number of pending repairs at service centers.
kpicollection.formula: Total Number of Pending Service Requests

kpicollection.explanation: Measures the availability of spare parts when needed.
kpicollection.formula: (Number of Spare Parts Available / Total Number of Spare Parts Requests) * 100

kpicollection.explanation: Measures the average time taken to fulfill spare parts orders.
kpicollection.formula: Total Time to Fulfill Spare Parts Orders / Total Number of Orders

kpicollection.kpi: Percentage of orders for incorrect spare parts
kpicollection.explanation: Measures the percentage of orders that contain incorrect spare parts.
kpicollection.formula: (Number of Incorrect Spare Parts Orders / Total Number of Spare Parts Orders) * 100

kpicollection.explanation: Measures how often the inventory of spare parts is turned over.
kpicollection.formula: Cost of Goods Sold for Spare Parts / Average Spare Parts Inventory

kpicollection.kpi: Warranty claims related to spare parts
kpicollection.explanation: Measures the number of warranty claims related to spare parts.
kpicollection.formula: (Number of Warranty Claims for Spare Parts / Total Number of Spare Parts Sold) * 100

kpicollection.explanation: Measures the proportion of spare parts that are obsolete.
kpicollection.formula: (Number of Obsolete Spare Parts / Total Number of Spare Parts in Inventory) * 100

kpicollection.explanation: Measures the percentage of spare parts that are returned.
kpicollection.formula: (Number of Returned Spare Parts / Total Number of Spare Parts Sold) * 100

kpicollection.kpi: Customer satisfaction with spare parts availability
kpicollection.explanation: Measures customer satisfaction with the availability of spare parts.
kpicollection.formula: Average Rating of Spare Parts Availability from Customer Feedback

kpicollection.explanation: Measures the percentage of employees who complete training programs.
kpicollection.formula: (Number of Employees Completing Training / Total Number of Employees Enrolled) * 100

kpicollection.explanation: Measures the percentage of employees who achieve certification after training.
kpicollection.formula: (Number of Employees Achieving Certification / Total Number of Employees Attempting Certification) * 100

kpicollection.explanation: Measures the improvement in employee performance after training.
kpicollection.formula: (Performance Rating Post-Training - Performance Rating Pre-Training) / Performance Rating Pre-Training * 100

kpicollection.explanation: Measures the cost of training per employee.
kpicollection.formula: Total Training Costs / Total Number of Employees Trained

kpicollection.explanation: Measures the satisfaction rate of training programs.
kpicollection.formula: Average Rating of Training Program Satisfaction from Employee Feedback

kpicollection.explanation: Measures the average time taken for employees to become competent after training.
kpicollection.formula: Average Time Taken for Employees to Reach Competency After Training

kpicollection.explanation: Measures the effectiveness of trainers.
kpicollection.formula: Average Rating of Trainer Effectiveness from Training Feedback

kpicollection.kpi: Return on investment (ROI) for training programs
kpicollection.explanation: Measures the return on investment for training programs.
kpicollection.formula: (Financial Benefits from Training Programs - Training Costs) / Training Costs * 100

kpicollection.explanation: Percentage of accurate and effective maintenance information provided in the maintenance guide, compared to the actual maintenance needs.
kpicollection.formula: (Number of Accurate Maintenance Guides / Total Number of Maintenance Guides) * 100

kpicollection.explanation: Measure of the ease of use and effectiveness of the maintenance guide for customers, based on feedback and usability testing results.
kpicollection.formula: Average Usability Rating of Maintenance Guides from User Feedback

kpicollection.explanation: Rate at which the maintenance guide is updated to reflect new information or changes, measured by the number of updates per year.
kpicollection.formula: Number of Updates to Maintenance Guides / Number of Months

kpicollection.explanation: Measure of customer satisfaction with the content, clarity, and usefulness of maintenance guides, gathered through surveys and feedback.
kpicollection.formula: Average Customer Satisfaction Score for Maintenance Guides

kpicollection.explanation: Degree to which maintenance procedures are followed according to established guidelines and standards, measured through audits and performance reviews.
kpicollection.formula: (Number of Compliant Maintenance Procedures / Total Number of Maintenance Procedures) * 100

kpicollection.explanation: Accuracy of translations of the maintenance guide into different languages, assessed through translation reviews and quality checks.
kpicollection.formula: (Number of Accurate Translations / Total Number of Translations) * 100

kpicollection.explanation: Average cost incurred to produce each version of the maintenance guide, including writing, design, translation, and production expenses.
kpicollection.formula: Total Cost of Producing Maintenance Guides / Total Number of Maintenance Guides Produced

kpicollection.explanation: Frequency of downloads for the maintenance guide from online sources, indicating customer engagement and access to the guide.
kpicollection.formula: (Number of Maintenance Guide Downloads / Total Number of Maintenance Guides Available) * 100

kpicollection.explanation: Rate at which the owner’s manual is updated to reflect changes in products or services, indicating the responsiveness to product updates and changes.
kpicollection.formula: Number of Updates to Owner’s Manual / Number of Months

kpicollection.explanation: Measure of how easily the owner’s manual can be accessed by customers, including availability through various channels such as print, online, or mobile.
kpicollection.formula: (Number of Accessible Owner’s Manual Versions / Total Number of Owner’s Manual Versions) * 100

kpicollection.kpi: Customer satisfaction with owners manual content.
kpicollection.explanation: Measure of customer satisfaction with the clarity, completeness, and usefulness of the owner’s manual content, gathered through surveys and feedback.
kpicollection.formula: Average Customer Satisfaction Score for Owner’s Manual Content

kpicollection.explanation: Degree to which the owner’s manual adheres to regulatory requirements, measured through compliance checks and reviews.
kpicollection.formula: (Number of Compliant Owner’s Manuals / Total Number of Owner’s Manuals) * 100

kpicollection.explanation: Accuracy of translations of the owner’s manual into different languages, assessed through translation reviews and quality checks.
kpicollection.formula: (Number of Accurate Translations / Total Number of Translations) * 100

kpicollection.explanation: Average cost incurred to produce and distribute each version of the owner’s manual, including writing, design, translation, and production expenses.
kpicollection.formula: Total Cost of Owner’s Manual Updates / Total Number of Manual Versions

kpicollection.explanation: Frequency of downloads for the owner’s manual from online sources, indicating customer engagement and access to the manual.
kpicollection.formula: (Number of Owner’s Manual Downloads / Total Number of Owner’s Manuals Available) * 100

kpicollection.explanation: Measure of the rate at which usability improvements are made to the owner’s manual based on user feedback and testing results.
kpicollection.formula: (Current Usability Score - Previous Usability Score) / Previous Usability Score * 100

kpicollection.explanation: Percentage of safety instructions followed compared to the total number of instructions provided, reflecting adherence to safety guidelines.
kpicollection.formula: (Number of Compliant Safety Instructions / Total Number of Safety Instructions) * 100

kpicollection.explanation: Measure of how effective safety instructions are in improving safety practices, based on feedback and observed safety improvements.
kpicollection.formula: Average Effectiveness Rating of Safety Instructions from User Feedback

kpicollection.explanation: Measure of customer satisfaction with the clarity, relevance, and usefulness of safety instructions, gathered through surveys and feedback.
kpicollection.formula: Average Customer Satisfaction Score for Safety Instructions

kpicollection.explanation: Rate at which safety instructions are updated to reflect new safety information or changes, measured by the number of updates per year.
kpicollection.formula: Number of Updates to Safety Instructions / Number of Months

kpicollection.explanation: Accuracy of translations of safety instructions into different languages, assessed through translation reviews and quality checks.
kpicollection.formula: (Number of Accurate Translations / Total Number of Translations) * 100

kpicollection.explanation: Average cost incurred for producing each set of safety instructions, including writing, design, translation, and production expenses.
kpicollection.formula: Total Cost of Producing Safety Instructions / Total Number of Safety Instructions Produced

kpicollection.explanation: Measure of how easily safety instructions can be accessed by customers, including availability through various channels such as print, online, or mobile.
kpicollection.formula: (Number of Accessible Safety Instructions / Total Number of Safety Instructions) * 100

kpicollection.explanation: Rate at which usability improvements are made to safety instructions based on user feedback and testing results.
kpicollection.formula: (Current Usability Score - Previous Usability Score) / Previous Usability Score * 100

kpicollection.explanation: Measure of how effective usage tips are in helping users understand and utilize products, based on feedback and engagement metrics.
kpicollection.formula: Average Rating of the Effectiveness of Usage Tips from User Feedback

kpicollection.kpi: Usage tips adoption rate among users.
kpicollection.explanation: Percentage of users who engage with and utilize provided usage tips compared to the total number of users, indicating the appeal and effectiveness of the tips.
kpicollection.formula: (Number of Users Who Adopt Usage Tips / Total Number of Users) * 100

kpicollection.kpi: Cost savings from usage tips implementation.
kpicollection.explanation: Financial savings achieved from implementing effective usage tips, calculated as reduced costs due to improved product usage and fewer support requests.
kpicollection.formula: (Estimated Savings from Usage Tips - Cost of Implementing Usage Tips) / Cost of Implementing Usage Tips * 100

kpicollection.kpi: Usage tips compliance with safety guidelines.
kpicollection.explanation: Degree to which usage tips adhere to safety guidelines and best practices, measured through reviews and safety compliance checks.
kpicollection.formula: (Number of Compliant Usage Tips / Total Number of Usage Tips) * 100

kpicollection.kpi: User satisfaction with usage tips relevance.
kpicollection.explanation: Measure of how satisfied users are with the relevance and usefulness of the provided usage tips, gathered through surveys and feedback.
kpicollection.formula: Average User Satisfaction Score for the Relevance of Usage Tips

kpicollection.explanation: Rate at which usage tips are updated to reflect new information, changes, or user feedback, indicating the currency of the tips.
kpicollection.formula: Number of Updates to Usage Tips / Number of Months

kpicollection.kpi: Usage tips engagement metrics (e.g., views, shares).
kpicollection.explanation: Measure of user engagement with usage tips, including metrics like views, shares, and interactions.
kpicollection.formula: (Number of Views + Shares) / Number of Usage Tips

kpicollection.kpi: Usage tips impact on product longevity.
kpicollection.explanation: Measure of how usage tips contribute to the longevity and durability of products, based on product performance and feedback.
kpicollection.formula: (Increase in Product Longevity Due to Usage Tips / Initial Product Longevity) * 100

kpicollection.explanation: The average time taken to respond to billing inquiries.
kpicollection.formula: Total Time to Respond to Billing Inquiries / Number of Billing Inquiries

kpicollection.explanation: Measures the accuracy of billing.
kpicollection.formula: (Number of Accurate Billings / Total Number of Billings) * 100

kpicollection.explanation: The average time taken to resolve billing disputes.
kpicollection.formula: Total Time to Resolve Billing Disputes / Number of Billing Disputes

kpicollection.kpi: Percentage of invoices paid on time
kpicollection.explanation: Measures the proportion of invoices that are paid by the due date.
kpicollection.formula: (Number of Invoices Paid on Time / Total Number of Invoices) * 100

kpicollection.explanation: Measures the percentage of billing errors.
kpicollection.formula: (Number of Billing Errors / Total Number of Bills Issued) * 100

kpicollection.explanation: Measures how satisfied customers are with the billing support provided.
kpicollection.formula: Average Customer Satisfaction Rating on Billing Support

kpicollection.explanation: The average time taken to complete a billing cycle.
kpicollection.formula: Total Time from Invoice Creation to Payment Received / Number of Invoices

kpicollection.explanation: Measures the percentage of outstanding invoices that are collected.
kpicollection.formula: (Total Amount Collected from Outstanding Invoices / Total Amount of Outstanding Invoices) * 100

kpicollection.explanation: The average time taken to resolve customer complaints.
kpicollection.formula: Total Time to Resolve Complaints / Number of Complaints

kpicollection.explanation: The percentage of complaints that are resolved.
kpicollection.formula: (Number of Complaints Resolved / Total Number of Complaints) * 100

kpicollection.kpi: Customer satisfaction with complaint resolution process
kpicollection.explanation: Measures how satisfied customers are with the complaint resolution process.
kpicollection.formula: Average Customer Satisfaction Rating on Complaint Resolution Process

kpicollection.explanation: Measures the proportion of complaints that are repeated by the same customers.
kpicollection.formula: (Number of Repeat Complaints / Total Number of Complaints) * 100

kpicollection.explanation: Measures the effectiveness of corrective actions taken to resolve complaints.
kpicollection.formula: (Number of Effective Corrective Actions / Total Number of Corrective Actions) * 100

kpicollection.kpi: Number of complaints resolved per agent
kpicollection.explanation: Measures the productivity of customer service agents in resolving complaints.
kpicollection.formula: Total Number of Complaints Resolved / Total Number of Agents

kpicollection.explanation: Measures the percentage of complaints that are escalated to higher management levels.
kpicollection.formula: (Number of Complaints Escalated / Total Number of Complaints) * 100

kpicollection.explanation: Measures how well the procedures for handling complaints work.
kpicollection.formula: Average Rating of Complaint Handling Procedures Effectiveness

kpicollection.kpi: Average response time to customer inquiries
kpicollection.explanation: The average time taken to respond to customer inquiries.
kpicollection.formula: Total Time to Respond to Inquiries / Number of Inquiries

kpicollection.explanation: Measures the percentage of customer issues resolved on the first call.
kpicollection.formula: (Number of Issues Resolved on First Call / Total Number of Calls) * 100

kpicollection.explanation: Measures customers' satisfaction with how their inquiries are handled.
kpicollection.formula: Average Customer Satisfaction Rating on Inquiry Handling

kpicollection.kpi: Number of inquiries resolved per agent
kpicollection.explanation: Measures the productivity of customer service agents.
kpicollection.formula: Total Number of Inquiries Resolved / Total Number of Agents

kpicollection.kpi: Quality of responses to customer inquiries
kpicollection.explanation: Measures how well responses to customer inquiries meet quality standards.
kpicollection.formula: Average Quality Rating of Responses to Inquiries

kpicollection.kpi: Percentage of inquiries escalated to higher levels
kpicollection.explanation: Measures the proportion of inquiries that need to be escalated.
kpicollection.formula: (Number of Inquiries Escalated / Total Number of Inquiries) * 100

kpicollection.kpi: Accuracy of information provided in responses
kpicollection.explanation: Measures how accurate the information provided to customers is.
kpicollection.formula: (Number of Accurate Responses / Total Number of Responses) * 100

kpicollection.explanation: The average time taken to resolve complex customer inquiries.
kpicollection.formula: Total Time to Resolve Complex Inquiries / Number of Complex Inquiries

kpicollection.kpi: Average response time to service requests
kpicollection.explanation: The average time taken to respond to service requests.
kpicollection.formula: Total Time to Respond to Service Requests / Number of Service Requests

kpicollection.explanation: The percentage of service requests that are fulfilled.
kpicollection.formula: (Number of Fulfilled Service Requests / Total Service Requests) * 100

kpicollection.explanation: The total number of unfulfilled service requests.
kpicollection.formula: Number of Unresolved Service Requests

kpicollection.kpi: Customer satisfaction with service request process
kpicollection.explanation: Measures how satisfied customers are with the service request process.
kpicollection.formula: Average Customer Satisfaction Rating on Service Request Process

kpicollection.kpi: Percentage of service requests completed on time
kpicollection.explanation: Measures the proportion of service requests completed within the agreed timeframe.
kpicollection.formula: (Number of Service Requests Completed on Time / Total Number of Service Requests) * 100

kpicollection.explanation: The average time taken to resolve a service request.
kpicollection.formula: Total Time to Resolve Service Requests / Number of Service Requests

kpicollection.explanation: Measures how accurately service requests are handled.
kpicollection.formula: (Number of Accurate Service Requests / Total Number of Service Requests) * 100

kpicollection.kpi: Number of service requests per customer
kpicollection.explanation: Measures the average number of service requests made by each customer.
kpicollection.formula: Total Number of Service Requests / Total Number of Customers

kpicollection.explanation: The average time taken to resolve warranty claims.
kpicollection.formula: Total Time to Resolve Warranty Claims / Number of Warranty Claims

kpicollection.explanation: Measures the percentage of warranty claims that are rejected.
kpicollection.formula: (Number of Warranty Claims Rejected / Total Number of Warranty Claims) * 100

kpicollection.explanation: The average time taken to complete repairs.
kpicollection.formula: Total Time Spent on Repairs / Number of Repairs

kpicollection.kpi: Percentage of repairs covered under warranty
kpicollection.explanation: Measures the proportion of repairs that are covered under warranty.
kpicollection.formula: (Number of Repairs Covered Under Warranty / Total Number of Repairs) * 100

kpicollection.explanation: Measures customers' satisfaction with warranty services.
kpicollection.formula: Average Customer Satisfaction Rating on Warranty Service

kpicollection.kpi: Warranty cost as a percentage of revenue
kpicollection.explanation: Measures the cost of warranty claims relative to revenue.
kpicollection.formula: (Total Warranty Costs / Total Revenue) * 100

kpicollection.explanation: The total number of repairs that were repeated for the same issue.
kpicollection.formula: Total Count of Repeat Repairs

kpicollection.explanation: Measures the percentage of warranty claims that are approved.
kpicollection.formula: (Number of Approved Warranty Claims / Total Number of Warranty Claims) * 100

kpicollection.explanation: Total count of vehicle accessory installations completed within a specified period, reflecting the volume of accessory services.
kpicollection.formula: Total Number of Accessory Installations

kpicollection.explanation: Percentage of accessory installations completed correctly according to customer requirements and product specifications.
kpicollection.formula: (Number of Accurate Installations / Total Number of Installations) * 100

kpicollection.explanation: Measure of customer satisfaction with the quality and outcome of accessory installations, typically obtained through post-installation surveys.
kpicollection.formula: Average Satisfaction Score from Customers Regarding Accessory Installation

kpicollection.explanation: Average time taken to complete an accessory installation from the initial order to the final delivery, reflecting the efficiency of the installation process.
kpicollection.formula: Average Time from Accessory Installation Order to Completion

kpicollection.explanation: Average cost incurred for each accessory installation, including labor, materials, and overhead expenses.
kpicollection.formula: Total Cost of Accessory Installations / Total Number of Accessory Installations

kpicollection.kpi: Return on investment (ROI) from accessory installations.
kpicollection.explanation: Financial return achieved from accessory installations compared to the costs incurred, calculated as the ratio of benefits to expenses.
kpicollection.formula: (Net Benefits from Installations / Total Cost of Installations) * 100

kpicollection.kpi: Accessory installation compliance with safety standards.
kpicollection.explanation: Degree to which accessory installations adhere to safety regulations and standards, measured through compliance checks and audits.
kpicollection.formula: (Number of Installations Complying with Safety Standards / Total Number of Installations) * 100

kpicollection.explanation: Rate at which new and innovative accessory installation options or techniques are developed and implemented.
kpicollection.formula: (Number of New Installation Methods Introduced / Total Number of Installations) * 100

kpicollection.explanation: Total number of extended warranties sold within a specified period, reflecting the success of the warranty sales strategy.
kpicollection.formula: Total Number of Extended Warranties Sold

kpicollection.explanation: Percentage of customers who purchase an extended warranty compared to the total number of customers who are offered the warranty.
kpicollection.formula: (Number of Extended Warranties Sold / Total Number of Customers) * 100

kpicollection.explanation: Percentage of sales transactions that include the purchase of an extended warranty, measured as a ratio of warranty sales to total sales.
kpicollection.formula: (Number of Vehicles Sold with Warranties / Total Number of Vehicles Sold) * 100

kpicollection.explanation: Percentage of extended warranties that result in a claim, calculated as the number of claims divided by the total number of warranties sold.
kpicollection.formula: (Number of Warranty Claims / Total Number of Warranties Sold) * 100

kpicollection.explanation: Measure of customer satisfaction with the terms, coverage, and overall value of extended warranties, typically gathered through post-purchase surveys.
kpicollection.formula: Average Satisfaction Score from Customers Regarding Extended Warranties

kpicollection.kpi: Return on investment (ROI) from extended warranty sales.
kpicollection.explanation: Financial return achieved from extended warranty sales compared to the costs incurred, calculated as the ratio of benefits to expenses.
kpicollection.formula: (Net Benefits from Extended Warranty Sales / Total Cost of Extended Warranty Sales) * 100

kpicollection.explanation: Average cost incurred for selling an extended warranty, including marketing, administration, and sales expenses.
kpicollection.formula: Total Cost of Extended Warranty Sales / Total Number of Extended Warranties Sold

kpicollection.explanation: Measure of the overall effectiveness of the extended warranty program, based on customer feedback, claim management, and financial performance.
kpicollection.formula: Average Effectiveness Score of the Warranty Program

kpicollection.kpi: Number of vehicles customized per month.
kpicollection.explanation: Total count of vehicles customized by the company each month, indicating the volume of customization activities.
kpicollection.formula: Total Number of Vehicles Customized / Number of Months

kpicollection.explanation: Percentage of vehicle customizations completed accurately according to customer specifications and requirements.
kpicollection.formula: (Number of Accurate Customizations / Total Number of Customizations) * 100

kpicollection.explanation: Satisfaction level of customers with the quality and outcome of their vehicle customization, measured through surveys or feedback.
kpicollection.formula: Average Satisfaction Score from Customers Regarding Vehicle Customization

kpicollection.explanation: Average time required to complete a vehicle customization from the initial order to final delivery, reflecting the efficiency of the customization process.
kpicollection.formula: Average Time from Customization Order to Completion

kpicollection.explanation: Average cost incurred for each vehicle customization, including materials, labor, and overhead expenses.
kpicollection.formula: Total Cost of Vehicle Customizations / Total Number of Vehicles Customized

kpicollection.kpi: Return on investment (ROI) from vehicle customization.
kpicollection.explanation: Financial return achieved from vehicle customization activities compared to the costs incurred, calculated as the ratio of benefits to expenses.
kpicollection.formula: (Net Benefits from Customizations / Total Cost of Customizations) * 100

kpicollection.explanation: Rate at which new and innovative customization options are developed and offered to customers.
kpicollection.formula: (Number of New Customization Methods Introduced / Total Number of Customizations) * 100

kpicollection.explanation: Degree to which vehicle customizations adhere to industry regulations and standards, measured through compliance checks and audits.
kpicollection.formula: (Number of Customizations Complying with Regulations / Total Number of Customizations) * 100

kpicollection.explanation: Percentage of eligible customers who enroll in a protection plan, calculated as the number of enrollees divided by the total number of eligible customers.
kpicollection.formula: (Number of Enrolled Customers / Total Number of Eligible Customers) * 100

kpicollection.explanation: Percentage of protection plans that are activated after purchase, measured as the number of activated plans compared to the total number of purchased plans.
kpicollection.formula: (Number of Activated Plans / Total Number of Sold Plans) * 100

kpicollection.explanation: Percentage of protection plans that are actively used by customers, indicating how often customers take advantage of the plan’s benefits.
kpicollection.formula: (Number of Used Plans / Total Number of Activated Plans) * 100

kpicollection.explanation: Measure of customer satisfaction with the protection plan’s coverage, benefits, and overall value, typically collected through post-enrollment surveys.
kpicollection.formula: Average Satisfaction Score from Customers Regarding the Protection Plan

kpicollection.explanation: Percentage of protection plan customers who renew their plans at the end of the coverage period, indicating the plan’s value and effectiveness.
kpicollection.formula: (Number of Renewed Plans / Total Number of Expired Plans) * 100

kpicollection.kpi: ROI (Return on Investment) from protection plans.
kpicollection.explanation: Financial return achieved from protection plans compared to the costs incurred, calculated as the ratio of benefits to expenses.
kpicollection.formula: (Net Benefits from Protection Plans / Total Cost of Protection Plans) * 100

kpicollection.explanation: Average cost incurred to support each protection plan member, including administrative and support costs.
kpicollection.formula: Total Cost of Protection Plans / Total Number of Plan Members

kpicollection.kpi: Protection plan compliance with service level agreements.
kpicollection.explanation: Degree to which the protection plan adheres to the agreed-upon service levels and commitments, measured through audits and performance assessments.
kpicollection.formula: (Number of Plans Complying with SLAs / Total Number of Plans) * 100

kpicollection.explanation: Average time taken to process insurance claims from initial submission to final resolution, reflecting efficiency in claims management.
kpicollection.formula: Average Time Taken to Process Claims

kpicollection.explanation: Percentage of claims settled compared to the total number of claims filed, indicating the effectiveness of the claims resolution process.
kpicollection.formula: (Number of Claims Settled / Total Number of Claims) * 100

kpicollection.explanation: Measure of customer satisfaction with the claims management process, including handling, resolution, and communication, gathered through surveys and feedback.
kpicollection.formula: Average Customer Satisfaction Score for Claims Management

kpicollection.explanation: Percentage of claims processed correctly without errors, reflecting the precision of the claims handling process.
kpicollection.formula: (Number of Accurate Claims / Total Number of Claims) * 100

kpicollection.explanation: Average cost incurred to process each insurance claim, including administrative and operational expenses.
kpicollection.formula: Total Cost of Processing Claims / Total Number of Claims Processed

kpicollection.explanation: Percentage of insurance claims denied compared to the total number of claims submitted, reflecting the stringency of the claims approval process.
